budget.title: Financial Planner
budget.subtitle: Enter your monthly income and expenses to analyze your spending and make smart financial decisions

analysis.title: Three-Thirds Financial Analysis
analysis.chart_description: This chart compares your actual monthly spending across three categories—Obligations, Personal, and Investment—against the ideal "One-Third Rule". It helps you identify where your spending might need adjustment.
analysis.projection_description: This 5-year projection compares your current investment habit with the ideal one-third rule. The first line shows how much you'd save if you continue as you are. The second line shows the potential if you align your investments with the recommended portion of your income.
